Title: A call to struggle, glorious example
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The poster refers to Hua Guofeng's visit to the No. 6 mining area of the Tangshan Coal Mine, January 1977, some months after the devastating earthquake in Tangshan.
Theme: Hua GuofengHua Guofeng and earthquake relief
